name: Phlegethon (itch)
description:
Phlegethon is a submission to "Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice" made with the limitation "Failure is inevitable".

Play as a soul trying to escape the flaming river of blood: Phlegethon. Obstacles and other spirits will try to stop, but you can sacrifice your own blood to the river to destroy some of them.

Controls

Navigate the menu with WS / Arrows and the Spacebar.

Move with WASD or the arrow keys.

Attack with Spacebar.
